class_libraries.library:
<class name="CubicSplineShortCutterFilterJointTrajectoryWithConstraints" type="constraint_aware_spline_smoother::CubicSplineShortCutter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Generates collision free cubic spline trajectories
<class name="ParabolicBlendShortCutterFilterJointTrajectoryWithConstraints" type="constraint_aware_spline_smoother::ParabolicBlendShortCutter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Generates collision free parabolic spline trajectories
<class name="LinearSplineShortCutterFilterJointTrajectoryWithConstraints" type="constraint_aware_spline_smoother::LinearSplineShortCutter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Generates collision free linear trajectories
